name: The Cross Master
description:
The game is a simple 2D shooter in which enemies will spawn at the right corner of the screen the enemies cannot kill you if you touch them but if they succeed in reaching the left corner of the screen then it is a game over

controls:-

  1. left/right/up/down - to move
  2. space bar- shoot a bullet

to make the game harder you only have one bullet but you can call the bullet back by pressing the spacebar again

some more updates will come soon including a bullet sprite, to restart the game once you lose, if you lose in the game you need to quit it and reopen it to restart the game, more levels, and more enemy types,s, etc... so stay tuned. There could be some bugs with the game please comment on those bugs in the comment section. Thank you for taking interest in my game
